name: Adventure Escape: The Castle
description:
Join tens of millions of happy Haiku Game customers who say things like...
"Wonderful graphics and amusing dialogue!"
"A great combination of fun, challenging, funny, and creative. Great game!"

It's 1541 in Scotland and brilliant Iona must team up with her bumbling suitor Finley when she is suddenly trapped in a mysterious castle. Can you use your skills of observation and cunning to help her escape?

Encounter novel puzzles in this escape adventure game and discover the secrets of the Scottish Castle! Each room and floor in this castle features unique challenges and design.

- Enjoy beautiful painted graphics. Amazing illustrated style brings the castle's rooms to life.
- Complete five Acts to finish the adventure - each with unique escape challenges and discover why you are trapped
- Hilarious story with memorable characters like Finley, your persistent but dim-witted suitor
- Find hidden objects that help you break free
- Solve devious puzzles so you can escape
- It’s free! No registration, no hassles, just download and play.

Come see what all your friends are talking about!
